questions.question: What is programming?
options: The process of creating instructions for a computer to execute
A method of designing physical objects
The art of creating visual designs
questions.correctAnswer: The process of creating instructions for a computer to execute

questions.question: Which of the following is a programming language?
Which skill is essential for programming?
What is a variable in programming?
options: A symbolic name that stores data values
A fixed value that never changes
A part of the hardware in a computer
questions.correctAnswer: A symbolic name that stores data values

questions.question: Which data type holds whole numbers?
Why is understanding data types important in programming?
options: It ensures that operations on data are valid
It allows the program to run without memory
questions.correctAnswer: It ensures that operations on data are valid

questions.question: What is the purpose of control statements in programming?
options: To manage the flow of execution in a program
To store data values for future use
questions.correctAnswer: To manage the flow of execution in a program

questions.question: Which of the following is a conditional statement?
Which loop statement continues executing as long as the condition is true?
